dict.acceptation: 方面；面貌；方位，方向；形势；

sent.orig: Aspect-Oriented Programming(AOP) localize implementation of crosscutting concern by encapsulating them in an independent module called "aspect".
sent.trans: 面向方面的编程技术解决了横切关注点的模块化问题，它提供了一个叫做方面(aspect)的程序结构，将横切关注点封装在一个独立的模块里。

sent.orig: Aspect-Oriented Programming is a technique for separation of crosscutting concerns.
sent.trans: 面向切面编程(Aspect-Oriented Programming,简称AOP)作为一种新的编程技术正日益引起人们的关注。

sent.orig: Aspect-Oriented Programming is a new idea of programming.
sent.trans: 面向方面编程(Aspect Oriented Programming)是近年来新兴的一种编程思想。

sent.orig: Interest in future aspect comes from failure to appreciate the already aspect of Christ.
sent.trans: 对将来的事感兴趣，是因没有体会基督的[已临]层面。

sent.orig: A distributed perspective on leadership involves two aspects: the leader-plus aspect and the practice aspect.
sent.trans: 分布式领导力观点包括两个方面：建立分布式领导力框架和领导力实践。
